website_summaries.verdict: A solid deal that competitors can't beat (with the exception of the subpar remote). User-friendly and budget-friendly.
pros: A value-priced model w/ impressive features: USB port, slim design, shock resistance, ability to play DVDs and CDs
Easy to set up and use
cons: features aren't fancy, but for the price, you may not mind
Remote is small and feels flimsy

customer_reviews.title: No frills, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality DVD player - I didn't need anything fancy. I haven't had it long, but so far it does the job. I didn't give it 5 stars because of the remote. The buttons on the remote are very small and are all the same shape. I have better than 20/20 vision and I still must have good lighting and look very closely to read the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: jake9722

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job but for some reason it leaves a weird static type view on all my DVDs. It's like the connection is bad but I've tried different ports and it doesn't change. I'm guessing the connecting cords on mine were just not well made or something. It still works ok, it's just annoying to see lines across my screen. UPDATE: This thing is awful. It will act like it wants to play disks but constantly skips or stops all together when the disk has nothing wrong with it! Super annoying, I’ve had this for less than 3 months and already had to buy a new one. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Stripe

customer_reviews.title: Defective Remote
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small TV in my kitchen. It arrived on time but when I hooked it up the remote did not work. I tried brand new batteries and ...nothing..It will play by using the small buttons in the front but it very inconvenient. Also it will not pause or pick up where you left off..
customer_reviews.author: Another fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Unit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a DVD player with slow motion and zoom since Blu Ray players do not have these features. This unit appeared to be the best fit at a reasonable price. It is also small and takes up minimal space. It is HDMI out and up-converts to better resolution. I like it so much I bought a second one as a back up for the future. I saw another review about the remote control being small. Yes it is, but you figure it out and actually being small is nice since it weighs little and is not a big clumsy unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the opportunity to use this a few times, but it does exactly what i want it to do...play DVD's. I notice that others have complained about the remote. Personally, i dont have an issue with it, its your basic remote. I had the player set up and ready to go within 5 mins of taking it out of the box. The one thing i do find odd is the timer on the front of the unit. It only goes up to 60 mins and then starts counting up from zero again. Whats up with that??? However, for the price and ease of use, I'm perfectly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GJC

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous remote!!! Remote doesnt work after one use!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this new DVD player because my other one broke. Anyway...worked great the first time I used it and after that, the remote completely doesnt work. I have tried everything. 3 sets of bew batteries, etc. Also, the remote is really designed stupidly. The buttons dont make sense as to where they are on the remote. The buttons are so small and the writing is clear so I literally have to use a flashlight to read it. Im 30!!!!!!! So....I have to buy a universal remote to be able to work it or do what I am doing now which is get up and push the button on the actual player. Too late to return. Real bummer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI out?!?
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally confused to open the box and find that this DVD player has no HDMI out. The manufacturer, in one of the customer reviews, states that there is component and HDMI out, but there is clearly NO HDMI out on the player I received. A bit unfathomable in 2017. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Starr

customer_reviews.title: I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player itself works, but the remote does not, and there are not forward or backward buttons on the actual player. I changed the batteries in the remote twice and I feel safe in saying that it is not a battery issue.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Why did I buy this???
customer_reviews.text: The old saying applies to this dvd player: "You get what you paid for".....I have had this since late October and I have had nothing but problems,it won't read a lot of dvds or cdrs ,tiny remote control, and what's worse is while watching a movie you can see the " Impecca" logo in the background( Check photos),so annoying!!.....Going to try to return it, if I can't; I'll donate it to charity.....DO NOT BUY THIS DVD PLAYER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hare

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival!
customer_reviews.text: I am having to return this product. The remote control did not work. After hooking up with the HDMI cable, there was a picture but no sound. I was not impressed at all with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: econline

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this DVD player!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought this player just as I was moving so it was two months before I used it and because of that length of time, I couldn't return it. It constantly freezes when playing or skips. I tried cleaning it twice. It took a half hour each time because it kept freezing on the cleaner disc. The marking on the buttons of the remote are unreadable and very tiny. I am buying a new DVD player right now and I am so annoyed that I bought the cheapest player on Amazon. Spend a couple dollars more and get a player that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mara

customer_reviews.title: A LEMON!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about a week. So I got rid of the box. Then not. It skips, stalls, sputters, freezes. Obviously defective. Sometimes it tells me there's no disc when there is one. Sometimes I just get a black screen. One time a rented disc was in there and it would NOT eject it. Had to bust the thing open. Extremely frustrating. That's what I get for buying American made electronics! DO NOT BUY. Spend a few more bucks for a name brand you have actually heard of.
customer_reviews.author: Lona Ford

customer_reviews.title: The remote stinks. Way too small. Buttons are ...
customer_reviews.text: The remote stinks. Way too small. Buttons are so small you need flashlight to see the buttons. FYI:. I made an enlarged copy of remote instructions and will refer to this to activate remote. DVD seems to be working well. RETURNING this player and will be requesting a refund...after using this several times, it seems I made a mistake about it working well...problems have occurred...brand new DVDs are intermittently stopping and one completely stopped.
customer_reviews.author: 3kids

customer_reviews.title: Decent Player
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this DVD player out on the porch to play our interval training fitness DVDs. The player doesn't seem to be affected by the changing temps or inclement weather. It's been working great for several months now. I will say the remote is rather rudimentary and doesn't have the normal play button configuration most remotes seem to have.
customer_reviews.author: William Struse

customer_reviews.title: MY NAME IS SKIPPY...BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY BAD DVD PLAYER....DO...NOT....BUY!!! IF YOU WANT TO WATCH A DVD THAT HAS 8SHOWS...IT WILL ONLY SHOW FOUR. THEN THERE ARE DOZENS OF TIMES WHERE IT WILL SAY...NO DISC! I BOUGHT BRAND NEW DVD'S...AND IT STILL.SAYS...NO DISC! WASTE OF MONEY! WHAT GOOD IS A DVD PLAYER IF YOU CANT WATCH ALL THE SHOWS ON THE DVD??? I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO TAKE DVD OUT OF THE PLAYER AND PLACE IN MY COMPUTER TO WATCH!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Christian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Player didn't work properly. Could only view 1st episode on multi episode DVD. Remote did not work; put in new batteries per Troubleshooting guide, but it remained dead. Don't know if problem with receiver on player or with remote. Contacted Customer Support and left VM via phone requesting return call. Left message on company website for a return call describing problem; no response. Decided to return. Customer Support called next day.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hissom

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working...
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with player when I received it. Placed it in my guest room. Played one DVD when it arrived. No problem. Expecting guests in another week, so while preparing the room decided to watch a DVD. Would not load. Tried several DVDs... nothing. Checked cables... no problem. Checked settings... no problem. Unable to return as I tossed the box and packaging when I set it up and everything worked. Ordering better quality DVD player today.
customer_reviews.author: G. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: the first dvd was delivered but had a defect called the company nicest person you could ever find they tried to help but it was broken . so we sent it back it was so easy they sent another one same kind to us no hsassle no problem and it is the best you can find. I really love this dvd player. then I found out it's an awesome company they make refrigerators stoves all kins of things so that will be our number1 company for us Yes! i would recommend this company love my dvd player it's small(compact) fits easily in small areas
customer_reviews.author: ltra

customer_reviews.title: NEED CERTAIN CABLES THAT ARE NOT SUPPLIED TO CONNECT TO NEW TV'S
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS PARTICULAR PRODUCT BECAUSE IT SAID IT WAS AMAZON'S FAVORITE. THE PRODUCT WORKS WELL. THE PROBLEM WE HAD WAS INSTALLING IT. WE COULD NOT INSTALL IT ON OUR NEWEST TV. WE WERE ABLE TO INSTALL IT ON AN OLDER TV AND HAD TO MOVE THAT TV INTO THE LIVING ROOM TEMPERARILY TO WATCH A CERTAIN DVD. SO NOW THIS DVD PLAYER WE JUST BOUGHT WILLHAVE TO BE PLACED IN THE BEDROOM HOOKED UP TO AN OLDER TV.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN MARCH

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly player and remote!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook-up, easy to use. Great picture quality and sound. The buttons on the player appear sleek and have a quality feel to them, and they work well. The remote buttons are larger than many with a refreshing simplicity. Very user friendly! The remote may not have the most elegant or high tech look, but it has a clean look, and it is very easy to use. It would be a perfect remote for anyone who is tired of dealing with remotes filled with too many tiny buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Product does not function properly. The remote only works ...
customer_reviews.text: Product does not function properly. The remote only works when it is right up against the DVD player, which obviously defeats the purpose. I've only used it 3 times, replaced the batteries to see if the batteries that came with it were the problem. I went to send it back today and the refund window actually closed a few weeks after I purchased it...
customer_reviews.author: Shann

customer_reviews.title: great tv/ dvd for the price !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv DVD player perfect for my grandkids room !! It gets a lot of use and has held up great !!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and doesn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This unit fails to play many commercial and home made DVD's. Whereas my 10yr old DVD player plays 99% of them. Almost all functions must be operated from the tiny remote. Only reason I kept it is because I use it mostly for CD's.
customer_reviews.author: CCJones

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it :(
customer_reviews.text: Brought a few months ago i was very excited that i could watch my UK DVD's again but the picture is terrible but bearable, Fast forward a few months and when you turn this thing on it sounds like an airplane is taking off you have to turn the tv up so loud and its very distracting, fast forward another few weeks and I started having problems with the disks, every one i was putting in would say invalid, and then a few days later it now plays nothing what so ever, I am out a DVD player and also nearly $30 :( Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Vk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could get my money back. Getting sound to work via HDMI cord was a mystery that the directions didn’t explain. One of my students finally said, “That’s what you get for buying a cheap off-brand.” I bought a more expensive known brand and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Missing simple features make this worthless
customer_reviews.text: We use a DVD player to run on auto-repeat. Doing so, you have an arrow and "ALL" on the screen at all times and there is no way to remove it. As silly as that sounds, they simply didn't program it to remove the setting from the display. I suppose if you don't change any of the settings, then the player will work just fine. For me, it was completely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: A2B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is not working correctly it’s skipping and freezing on new movies and making a lot of noise I have not had it very long for the price I should have just bought it locally but I wanted something better with better quality then I can find around here junk
customer_reviews.author: Speeddeamon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Background noise
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this player. I have only had it for a month and hope to replace it. It has never been dropped or or abused in any way. Although it plays, and the picture quality is fine, it is making a terrible background noise that is almost as loud as the movie volume. The remote works, if it is direct line of the player. I would not recommend it all.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this dvd
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t play well. Skips, disk draw gets stuck, makes a grinding noise when it gets started. Seems like a very old DVD player. I only use it for my exercise videos, which I only do occasionally. I wish I returned it before the return window closed. I will be replacing it with a dvd I purchased from another store. Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: what to know
customer_reviews.text: well I have played over 15 movies through it now and seems to work just fine. only one thing just remember, you will see a meter reading or time reading clicking off in the left hand corner of your screen. the only way to take it off is to click on the OSD button on your remote three times to clear it. you have to do it for every movie and please do not bother calling for tech support because there is none plus they have no idea what you are talking about. I have played regular movies and ones I burnt off the internet and they all work fine.
customer_reviews.author: steve smithbauer

customer_reviews.title: DVD
customer_reviews.text: This new DVD player is an IMPROVEMENT over the OLD Phillips DVD player that broke after some years of steady use. This NEW DVD player works ALL OFF REMOTE BUTTON where the Phillips had some of the buttons ON THE MACHINE. I do REDBOX MOVIES every Tuesday since I'm 73 yrs old and $1.80 is much better than $5.99 on a TV Service. Price was GREAT Service was FAST Can't ask for better than that.
customer_reviews.author: richard sellers

customer_reviews.title: Works great BUT...
customer_reviews.text: This dvd works great. It gets the job done BUT, I have discovered that the remote will also control my vizio sound bar and vice versa. It gets pretty annoying when I try to adjust the volume while using the dvd player and the sound bar remote turns it off, or pauses it or, ejects the disc. It's anyones guess as to what buttons work for which feature. Also, using the dvd remote to pause a movie will change the input on my sound bar so then I have to go back through the connections to get sound again, meanwhile, the dvd powers off. It's all very frustrating and somewhat like the plot of a prank.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit But Needs Bigger Remote
customer_reviews.text: This is a very compact unit and seems to work well. It does have a display which is nice, but it does not show what track you are on when playing an audio CD. This unit also has an HDMI connection and regular RCA connections. The remote control unit is also very small and the buttons are also small. I found the remote hard to use because of the small size and the button layout. I was hoping that this unit would play scratched DVDs that I get from the library, but it does not work any better in that regard then my previous unit.
customer_reviews.author: Art G

customer_reviews.title: Fine player, especially considering the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a couple of negative reviews on this box so was a bit nervous - but it came out of the box working just fine! The USB port reads thumb drives just fine though it seems to have a problem opening my external hard drive! DVD's and CD's perform excellently. Given an HD cable it works well with my smart TV. The HDMI cable should have been included with the player by default, though, why buy an HDMI capable player if not to plug it into an HDMI port?
customer_reviews.author: ScreechingSnake

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome budget DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome budget DVD player! I only purchased it because I needed to watch a specific DVD and didn't want to spend much money to do so. Now I've rediscovered my love of all my old DVDs and even bought a series on DVD after Netflix took it away. You never know when you will need a hard copy. Also, I love that I can finally watch my European region DVDs on my tv instead of my laptop. Remote buttons are very small but that's the only less than positive thing I can say. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Satre

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works fine
customer_reviews.text: Cheap DVD player. Purchased for my daughters room so it’s not a big deal. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie Reitz

customer_reviews.title: Impecca DVHP-9117
customer_reviews.text: I like the Impecca model DVHP-9117. It comes with a composite video cable. But it also has a port for an HDMI (High Definition Monitor Interface). I prefer HDMI and I bought one separately. HDMI cables come in different links and are not expensive. I also like the USB port which allows me to display pictures, run video and also play music, etc. from a thumb drive. This unit is not a Blu-Ray player, but it is still a good value. Technology is rapidly changing but I gladly rate this model with 4-stars.
customer_reviews.author: V.D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 45 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it two stars for looks, nice compact size, good packaging and decent controls. Need to take back all the rest of the stars though because it didn't work very well. It ran fine for half a movie then started freezing and skipping. Tried a different movie, same result. At this price point the quality is hit or miss... this time it was a miss for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Failed after approximately two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play my workout dvds. Simple task. After about two weeks the dvds started hanging up, as though buffering, then would resume. Restarting the dvd would temporarily fix the problem, only to have it happen again. Color me disappointed. Returned it and bought a Sony.
customer_reviews.author: mrbill

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.text: The remote is terrible have to push so hard on the buttons to get them to work. Hate that when I turn off DVD player is starts at beginning instead of where I left off. I hate this DVD player wish I didn’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: This unassuming machine has all the qualities of a much more expensive one. Set up in no time. The remote is very intuitive and has large lettering if you have vision issues. Played the older DVDs with clear HD quality and Blu Rays the same. My only issue is with the sound- haven't gotten the settings right or something. The volume fluxuates some.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! It quit working after 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! I've had mine for 6 weeks now and it quit working. Two weeks past the time limit to return it! What a joke... I don't have cable or network television because I live so far away from everything. My DVD player was my only source of entertainment and now it is gone. I guess I'm just out of the money it costs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture until it wasn't. After playing only 50 or so full-length DVDs it stopped playing movies in color and no longer had a clear picture. We tried the player on a different t.v. and even tried different plugs, but there was no change. Unfortunately, it was past the warrantee period, so the seller couldn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Whirling noise but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted a cheap DVD player since mine broke during a move. Works great, picture looks nice (considering I have a fairly old tv). I will agree with other users who said that it’s loud, I do sometimes have to raise the volume on the tv because of the whirling noises from the player but other than that, it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: destiney sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Screwed over twice
customer_reviews.text: True, this is a cheap ass dvd player, but it should still work! Bought a DVD player from this brand before that lasted 2 months, then bought another, not looking that it was same brand, different model. The second DVD player didn't even last one hour before screwing up like the first DVD player. Spend a little extra and not buy this player. P.S. - Amazon did refund 2nd player, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lallier

customer_reviews.title: IR sensor was non-functional upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the DVD functionality but after testing with different batteries and different remotes the IR sensor was clearly not working. Defeats the purpose of what this purchase was for. Don't know if this one was just a lemon or if there's a pattern of bad IR sensors for this product.
customer_reviews.author: x5

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, but does not read CDR
customer_reviews.text: I am a director with the DGA. I bought this very nice unit to review special watermarked DVD's of the top movies for review and voting in the Directors Guild. I had to return it because it would not read DVD-R or DVD-RW discs. Normally this would not have been an issue, but it simply would not play the discs.
customer_reviews.author: Vicmilt

customer_reviews.title: Great Aside from Spinning Noise
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it's great except for one thing: The sound of the DVD spinning is so loud. If stuff like that doesn't bother you you'll be fine but it's all I can hear when trying to watch movies. I even had Amazon send me a replacement in case it was a fluke in the first one and the second one did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Drew B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly affordable and dependable multi-region DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Because I trusted all the major brands I was skeptical about purchasing the Impecca DVHP9117 . Then I've been reading all the review and they were 90% positive so... I bought it! The price is extremely fair, the quality of the images (if you use the HDMI cable) is really good and it works perfectly! I have DVDs from Europe, Japan and the USA and it reads everything without any problem whatsoever. Thumbs definitely up!!! Max
customer_reviews.author: Max Leonida

customer_reviews.title: Nice but defective DVD player
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player was nice and compact I liked that about it but every DVD I tried to play freezes at some point in the movie .At first I thought it was the dvd then realized it was the player it self. I was not very please but it was not worth the trouble sending it back so I am going to buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: the usb on device
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first one the usb did not work so they sent me a replacement. they were quick with the replacement but no cigar that usb does not work either it reads the usb but won't play whats on it. I do not recommend this device to any one who wants to see movies through the usb, but the dvd player worked with an excellent picture.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: If you are just looking for a bedroom or extra DVD player, this is a nice addition. Its by no means fancy on the functions.But does the job. I really like it for the price. I've had this for about 3 months now and have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: EXBIGMIKE

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome little unit
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an awesome little unit. I previously purchased a Philips which stopped functioning the second week as well as being problematic playing various movies and did not play some of my home recorded CD's. This little unit has only faltered on one movie and the DVD had some scratiches; so I can't fault the machine. It also plays various format CD's which IS AWESOME! The thing is - IT WAS NEARLY HALF THE COST! You can't go wrong here!
customer_reviews.author: Silentgrayfellow

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent DVD player! I actually bought 2 of these, one to put in my van and one to put in my son's room. They both work great! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bama2324

customer_reviews.title: Great with one downfall for me. Not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.text: The dvd player is great! Durable. Clear picture. Easy to use buttons on the player as well as the remote. Pretty standard player and great quality for a decent price. Downfall is.. The connector cables that hook from player to tv are very thin so every so often I lose audio and will have to jiggle the cords around til it cuts back in.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Melton

customer_reviews.title: High definition/styling!😀
customer_reviews.text: It is just fantastic! Don't listen to the other reviews. You can set it to pick back up were you left off even after it shuts off after 10 minutes. I have had no problems with this product. I recommend this product. It works just fine and has all kinds of features. If you want to use the hdmi (high definition media import) port you do have to purchase that cord seperate, which I did and it works great 👍!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Lavold

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work, rendering DVD player useless
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Absolute junk- remote DOA and company won’t pay for return shipping for defective item, essentially making it cheaper to just buy another DVD player. Garbage!
customer_reviews.author: John Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great  price and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for playing CDs only during the holidays . I needed a CD musicplayer quickly to use with my vintage Kenwood receiver that I set up on my outside patio .It was delivered quickly and in good packaging. Easy to hook up and use. Sound quality is good and the remote control is simple to use. Works perfect. For the price you cannot find a CD/DVD player anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Buying Again 2yrs Later In 2019
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2017 and thought I already left a review. Looking at the poor rating and confused since I've never had an issue. I hope there was no "upgrade" and not working as before. I'll return it if I have any problems because I am buying again tonight. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Same Day TYVM

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a month in.
customer_reviews.text: Started off rough when installing as I was using a brand new HDMI cable to my TV and the DVD player had trouble pushing a clear signal but after some fiddling I managed to get it working. A couple weeks later, it just became completely unresponsive. It doesn't turn on regardless of what outlet it is plugged into and there was no power surge or anything than normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gluf

customer_reviews.title: Bad Remote Control
customer_reviews.text: Never even got to try it because the remote control doesn't work! Brand new in the box. I even replaced the batteries and the remote is completely dead. I should have read the other comments about the remote not working.
customer_reviews.author: bigdukem69

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this! Its hums so loud that I have to put up the volume to drown out the noise of the machine. It's very annoying! It won't be long before I replace it! It's too bad, I do like the light weight and the size, I don't even mind the remote!
customer_reviews.author: Therese St Germain

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player is not worth the money at all. I've only used it a few times. It makes a loud sound while the disc is spinning and it keeps freezing up during play. I've even tried to play a brand new DVD to see the problem was on the DVD but it is having the same problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good video quality - very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and compact - easy to hook up - very reasonable price. I bought this so my wife can watch her workout videos on our bedroom TV. Just puled in the electrical cord, plugged in the RCA cables, and turned it on. The only drawback is that the remote control is so small - it is hard to read the descriptions for the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money !
customer_reviews.text: Really great product for the money. I needed a DVD player because old one only played NTSC. The set up was really easy. The instructions were very small print. I thought it was going to be lengthy and difficult. In fact it was simple. Literally "plug and play". It does all it claims. Only minor complaint with the Remote. Very small buttons, very close together, Not for pudgy fingers ! and not very sensitive buttons, you really have to press hard to get response. But all things considered Great Value for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Henry Windsor III

customer_reviews.title: Won't Last Long!!
customer_reviews.text: purchased November 2018, stopped working, with only 3 uses April 2019, completely froze over, put favorite DVD in can't get it out won't respond with the remote or manually on the device. I read the other reviews should have taken heed
customer_reviews.author: Ms TPB

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this DVD player. Setup was a breeze - plug into HDMI cable from TV and insert a DVD. The picture quality is very good and can be adjusted in the settings. The sound can be turned up nice and loud. I love the slow motion feature as I watch dance videos. The remote is a good size, and all the buttons can be easily identified without having to use a magnifier. I have tremors and have not hit a wrong button yet. I have not had reason to use the other features offered with this player. I believe I got a good deal - quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Bad remote
customer_reviews.text: When I first received it, the remote didn't work. When I called them they said this is a common problem and they would send me a new remote. Remote is very tiny and hard to see the buttons. Doesn't like to go in reverse more than 10 second. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: plugged it in and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player never worked properly from day one. For a while, when it worked, it would only play black and white on my tv, no matter what I tried. The remote control is very tiny and the buttons are extremely hard to see. Then, on New Years Eve, it stopped working altogether. I had to run out in frigid temps to Walmart on New Years Eve and buy a new LG DVD player for the same price as this one, plugged it in and it works like a charm. I would never buy this again, nor would I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne J Pelckmann

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Purchase BELIEVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July for use once a month to show movies to my writing group. Picture became distorted more and more so replaced what I thought were defective cables. NOPE. It is the player. For you older folks, it is like watching Saturday Morning cartoons sent out by those weak TV stations 100 milse away in the 1950's. Nostalgia was not enough to rate this above absolutely dismal.
customer_reviews.author: BMatt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be the cheapest DVD player you’re going to find. So is the picture quality amazing? No, I feel like I’m in the early 2000s watching a box TV, but it does what you need it to and it’s easy to install. Worth if for the price in my opinion, but don’t expect greatness.
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: It’s very basic with no modern features.
customer_reviews.text: The remote doesn’t work from the couch to the tv. You have to be standing right up by the DVD player for the remote to work. You can’t fast forward in the normal fashion. It skips large chunks at a time so you can’t see what you’re fast forwarding through. We’ve only used it a couple of times so I’m not sure about the longevity of DVD player. It meets our basic needs but nothing to rave about. It arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: pat f

customer_reviews.title: installed it and it works fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it, installed it and it works fine so far. As to reliability etc we'll have to see Easy to hook up with supplied cable as both my HDMi and HDMi 2 ports are in use on this TV. Played one DVD fine . What else is it supposed to do???
customer_reviews.author: Magnut

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little player. I needed it to play DVDs because my computer doesn't have a DVD player. It was easy to hook up to my smart TV and plays all kinds of DVDs, not all professionally made. I had tried another brand that didn't work at all, but this is great. And a bargain too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Houdek

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is affordable
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a quick inexpensive replacement when old one died just before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Awesome DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: We have a small TV that only has hookups for an AV cable, so I was pleased to find a DVD player that had AV cables. This thing has been great since we hooked it up. Scratched DVDs have played flawless in it. The remote is very simple, no bells and whistles, which is perfect for our kids to use. Overall, this is a great DVD player. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KDmae

customer_reviews.title: Safe your money
customer_reviews.text: I am with the don't waste your money crowd. This is a very cheap imported unit that does not perform any function properly. Mine worked through three movies but remote mostly unusable and now not working off to recycling then back to China.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Moser

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: DVD restarts at beginning of you shut off the device, which is irritating if you watch movies in installments. Also, you need to point directly at it for the remote to work
customer_reviews.author: kerzi12

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dvd player. It is quiet and does not skip my dvds. I love that it has volume control on the remote and an on off indicator light. It is small and not bulky...priced just right. I highly recommend this little device.
customer_reviews.author: HappyParrot

customer_reviews.title: This product is compact, but awesome. Not to mention it comes with a great remote!!!
customer_reviews.text: Some how i thought this model would be larger. My old one is larger. I love my unit. I've had 2 movies for almost a year. I could not play them because they were from different regions of the U.S. This unit played them, and it was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Remote
customer_reviews.text: The player works fine, and it has captions that I wanted. However, the subtitles (captions) stay on all the time. Pushing the subtitle button will not remove them. Also, the tiny remote is almost a joke, can't read the little print on the buttons. Takes away from an otherwise good unit. marvin
customer_reviews.author: marvin spacek

customer_reviews.title: Recommended buy for a basic DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This a good basic DVD player. I bought this just so my wife and I can play movies. Using a HDMI cable for the connection to the TV, I found the setup to be easy using the instructions found in the user manual. As others have said, I found the remote buttons to be very small. This is why I gave it 4 stars. I tested the player for picture and sound quality and found both were very good. Because of this, I would recommend this player as a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Turkeyguy11

customer_reviews.title: Movie time
customer_reviews.text: this was so easy to put together just one two three plugs on the back and you're ready to go and it's got great screen quality and for the price that I got it for it's just it's just great to have and the movies look wonderful and my animated movies are beautiful on it so thank you for a very good product
customer_reviews.author: dcm123

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of money. It skips. It makes grinding noises. Do not Wate your money. Not worth returning time threw away AMD buy knew one at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Lori nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bedroom tv to play workout videos. I’ve used it about 6 times and every time it has gotten ‘stuck’ while playing. I have to pause and then play to get it going again and it will often skip ahead. The last time I used it I couldn’t ‘unstick’ it unless I shut it off and then turned it on again. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ap04

customer_reviews.title: I tested the player and it works just fine. It was not an expensive item so I ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller delivered promptly as promised. The product arrived in the condition stated--new. I read the reviews before buying and noticed that folks were commenting most on the tiny buttons on the remote control. They are indeed small but certainly legible. I tested the player and it works just fine. It was not an expensive item so I did not expect it to put out the quality of a more expensive product. I bought it for a guest bedroom so it is not going to be used every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Bikin' Beth

customer_reviews.title: One of few Amazon products I've ever had to return after years of ordering online
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product because it only played one DVD out of the 4 that I tried. I wasn't trying to play foreign DVDs, I was just trying to play regular American DVDs that came through Netflix but it didn't work. Even the one DVD that it did play was spastic at times. I hardly ever return any Amazon products but I had to return this one and pay for the packaging. Save your money and time and buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: taipan

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and use. Came with batteries and VGA cables!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these to connect to projectors. They worked great. The player controls are on the player itself, which is great if you lose the remote. And like I said the batteries were included as well as the VGA cables. If you want to use the HDMI port, you will have to supply that yourself. These worked perfectly for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tazracing1

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Well it plays - it’s the worst purchase I’ve had from Amazon - don’t waste your time - the remote is cheap and didn’t work tried different batteries and others tried as well unfortunately with out remote can only play and stop DVD - ended up being very frustrated ng
customer_reviews.author: DEBBY V.

customer_reviews.title: DVD player did not work properly did not care for it at all
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble with this DVD player when we went to use the remote after the disc loaded it never came up on the screen it just kept saying loading loading loading I had trouble with the remote using it did not work properly did not care for this DVD player at all
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: 2 poor paper weights not dvd players
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I have is not working, got an exchange but did not return in time so basically I bought 2 dvd players that freeze and wont boot half the time
customer_reviews.author: Chandra overington

customer_reviews.title: Trash. USB doesn't work. It will not play any format.
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest peice of crap I ever bought. Might as well throw it it the toilet. The USB won't play any format and since that is why I bought it. It is worthless. The remote is also fit for the toilet. Get out your microscope because the words on it are to small for the magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: sharon peters

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little player. I bought it for my spare tv and the other night my player for my large tv quit. I hooked this up just becouse I wanted to watch the rest of my dvd. It works really well. I will keep it hooked up to the big screen and get another for the other room.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie dean

customer_reviews.title: worked great out of the box for about a month
customer_reviews.text: You get what You pay for I suppose. It's getting harder to find just plain DVD players as manufacturers move on to newer tech, where all the real quality control goes toward. but that also means the older stuff is as cheap as it gets. worked great out of the box for about a month, but it's gotten a audible clicking when playing DVDs, the USB playback is perfect( no moving parts I guess), the remotes buttons are also pretty small, and not that well laid out.
customer_reviews.author: Neel Patel

customer_reviews.title: Comes complete with "connections kit" of RCA Cables Remote with Batteries!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great little DVD Player. I think that it is "region-free" meaning it can play PAL DVD's from Around the world, should you need to do that.. The Impecca DVD Player turned out to be "Impeccably Good!"
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DVD Player at the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleasantly surprised by this DVD player. It is half the size of my old one and took less than five minutes to set up. It came with all the cables you'll need plus batteries for the remote. So you are up and running almost instantly. The buttons on the remote are fairly easy to read (old eyes here). I mostly use DVDs from the public library so they are pretty beat up and the player has yet to reject any of them. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Virago

customer_reviews.title: Plays well for price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, had it for less than a month. The only problem so far is the remote control response takes several pushes before it opens you have to choose from the menu by going up and down you have to point the remote off to the side of DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Polnitz

customer_reviews.title: Good features but tiny remote (minor annoyance)
customer_reviews.text: product arrived promptly and with protective packaging. I've only used it one day , so far, installs easily, operates easily, but remote control is tiny and the printing for the buttons is very difficult to read. But it has good features and is priced competitively. Overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MOLLY

customer_reviews.title: Horrible DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player worked for about 2 months then died on me. What a piece of junk, don’t waste your money on this. Please. Don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars, I would. We bought this for our RV. The first time we used this it took a few tries before it would load a dvd. The second time we used it a this last weekend, it would not load the dvd at all. Unfortunately it is too late to return this useless item that we were only able to watch one dvd on before it completely quit working. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: lafa

product_meta.title: Impecca DVHP9117 Compact HDMI DVD Player, Upconvert DVDs to 1080p, with LED Display, and USB Port,
feature_bullets: Up-convert DVD video to Full-HD 1080p with fine detail, Compact Progressive Scan DVD Player

Play back from wide range of formats- Multi- format playability allow you to play distinctive file formats including CD/SVCD, MP3, WMA, DVD+-R/RW, DivX, DVD-R/-RW, DVD-Video for maximum viewing and listening pleasure. Meet your movie watching needs with DVD video player, offering excellent resolution and compatibility.

USB input: Revolutionize your video and multimedia experience by meeting entertainment needs prolifically. Play your Digital files directly via USB to create the soothing ambiance. Take your home entertainment experience to next level with the finest quality DVD player with USB port. Watch your favorite videos without any hassle.

Choose fast or slow playback with sound: Customize your entertainment with Skip, slow motion, advance zoom, & single step play functionality of Home DVD Player. Anti-shock protection ensure that you have nothing but uninterrupted viewing

Connectivity: 2.0 Channel DVD/CD Player support Coaxial Audio output for satisfying experience. It shows subtle shades and smoother graduation of colors, resulting in a more vibrant and natural picture. Have an incredible multimedia experience.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,867 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
